1: Coordinated Inspections Data Entry (CIDE) application tool.
31: Accomplished according to the measures/prescriptions on the inspeciton minutes
42: CIDE provides a set of tools supporting the efficient execution and documentation of the inspections with the relevant environmental domain in Croatia. In particular CIDE allows the management the Coordinated and specific inspections information for the SEVESO establishment as a part of the BIFISIC system.
44: Hybrid (web and mobile responsive) application - for human interaction
45: Application programming interface - for machine processing
46: CIDE has been developed within the Twinning project Chemicals and hazardous substances monitoring improvement and integration of Seveso database into Croatian Environmental Information System (CEIS) as the unique Central Seveso Information System (CRO SEVESO).
